The FBI, San Diego County Sheriff's Department, and United
States Marshal's Service investigated aspects of the Anderson
After countless hours analyzing testimony, witness accounts
and physical and electronic evidence, all three agencies
concluded that Hannah Anderson was telling the truth about
having no role in the murders of her mother and brother.
Today, Hannah lives with her father in Lakeside, California,
and hopes to pursue a career as a firefighter.
